definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to gather together, pool or collect/to happen by chance/to move close to/to exploit an opportunity

pinyin: Jin3 cou4 Miao3 zi3 Xian4 quan1

sentences.english: Precise design of complete machine, compact conformation, handiness and simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 整机设计精致，结构紧凑，操作方便简洁。

sentences.english: The feet are well-arched, compact, and turn neither in nor out.
sentences.chinese: 足爪呈拱形，紧凑，既不向内也不向外翻。

sentences.english: The F14 offers compact package dimensions and a pluggable pin header.
sentences.chinese: 在女性14例提供了紧凑的封装尺寸和可插入针。
紧凑，灵活，高集成度的功率分布。

sentences.english: This equipment is the compact structure vertical bin that can be installed in the narrow place.
sentences.chinese: 本设备是箱柜立式，结构紧凑，也可在狭窄地方安装。

sentences.english: As applications evolve over time, they often become less space -efficient.
sentences.chinese: 应用程序随着时间演化，它们常常变得不够紧凑。

sentences.english: There are six households inhabiting in the building, compact and orderly.
sentences.chinese: 楼内住有六户人家，家居紧凑，井然有序。

sentences.english: Compact florescent light bulbs, on the other hand, are a somewhat different story.
sentences.chinese: 相反，紧凑型荧光灯泡有些不同。

sentences.english: Simple and compact structure, high reliability, electrical components imported components.
sentences.chinese: 结构紧凑简单，可靠性高，电器元件采用进口元件。

sentences.english: However, the interface is slightly cluttered and the selection of hotels is limited.
sentences.chinese: 但是界面设计有点过于紧凑，酒店的选择也非常有限。

sentences.english: This results in a very compact internal representation.
sentences.chinese: 这导致一种非常紧凑的内部表示。

sentences.english: There was more hoopla surrounding the introduction of incandescent lights than there seems to be surrounding compact fluorescents.
sentences.chinese: 当时，引进白炽灯可比引进紧凑荧光灯热闹许多。

sentences.english: This will result in a very compact flowmeter.
sentences.chinese: 这将导致非常紧凑的流量计。

sentences.english: The biting ability of compact mill and the restricted condition of forced biting were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了紧凑式轧机咬入能力和强迫咬入的限制条件。

sentences.english: It is light-weight and occupies minimum space because of original design called double wrap scroll.
sentences.chinese: 采用双层重叠的独特设计，产品轻巧紧凑。

definition: according to a pattern/regular/orderly/structured/neat and tidy
to link up (disparate elements)/coherent (narrative, argument etc)
lit. new bud/fig. new and original
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
